title: Life Hack!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Th-This is amazing......! I have to try this!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Hanayo? Why did you get so loud?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ah, sorry, um...... You see, I, uh, learned about an amazing life hack!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>A life hack?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>There’s a way to make rice balls with freshly steamed hot rice!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>A rice ball with hot rice......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>The secret is...... using sarashi!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Sarashi, like the traditional cotton towel......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yup. If you use a wet but wrung-out sarashi towel, you can roll the rice without any rice grains sticking! Eli-chan, do you want to come over to my house and try it? No, wait, let’s invite everyone from µ’s to come and try it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, if you insist, Hanayo. Let’s do it. What should we put inside the rice balls?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
